alert.note: Alert for Central Oregon Coast; North Oregon Coast (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 06 at 11:32AM PST until January 07 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...South winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts 50 to 60 mph expected in communities set back from the ocean. Southwest winds of 35 to 45 mph with gusts to 70 mph along the beaches and headlands. Strongest winds will be from Lincoln City southward. * WHERE...In Washington, South Washington Coast. In Oregon, Central Oregon Coast and North Oregon Coast. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 10 AM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are expected. Travel may be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Central Oregon Coast; North Oregon Coast
